mean_cn: adj.普遍的，全体的；通用的；  n.普遍原则
mean_en: existent or operative everywhere or under all conditions; done by or involving all the people in the world or in a particular group; of worldwide scope or applicability
sentence: Electronic devices such as cellphones are universal now.
sentence_trans: 如今像手机这样的电子设备已经得到了普及。
word_etyma: uni一个 + vers=versus转变 + al具有...性质的 → 变成一个的 → universal普遍的，全体的
